Aug. 24, 1929 D Allendale Contest
Allendale Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
allendale-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Alexander's Feast
Allendale, Northumberland, England, UK Prizes - 1st £15, 2nd £10, 3rd £5. March contest - 1st(£2) Brancepeth Colliery, 2nd(£1) Oakenshaw Colliery, 3rd Haltwhistle Old. Best local band(£3) - Braes of Allen. Promoted by Allendale Agricultural Society. 7 bands competed.
Oct. 14, 2013, 11:34 a.m. Aug. 17, 2016, 9:45 a.m.
1 Brancepeth Welfare Band William Heap
2 Oakenshaw [Durham] Fred Wakeford
3 Crookhall Colliery William Richards
